full_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 2kg Pair (2 x 2kg), Blue Hex Dumbbells with Anti-Slip Coated Grip, Hand Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training for Women and Men

reasoning.keyword_integration: Embedded highest-volume keywords: 'dumbbells set' (448K), 'dumbbells' (215K), 'weights dumbbells set' (143K), 'dumbbells set women' (94K), 'weights for women' (48K), 'hand weights for women' (20K), 'neoprene dumbbells set' (7.3K). Used 'for women and men' phrasing to cover both high-volume gender-specific searches. Included verified features: hex design, anti-slip grip, 2kg weight.
